Māori wards: Thames-Coromandel District Council unanimously votes for Māori representation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/maori-wards-thames-coromandel-district-council-unanimously-votes-for-maori-representation/GGKGLKM26VBTXHBQ6POU3TCPIY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/maori-wards-thames-coromandel-district-council-unanimously-votes-for-maori-representation/GGKGLKM26VBTXHBQ6POU3TCPIY/ The council just became the 10th local authority in Waikato to establish the seats. Body of Northland diver found: Teen’s family’s long wait over https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-of-northland-diver-found-teens-familys-long-wait-over/KCQDXSZHL5CW7I5JXVZ2HJZY7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-of-northland-diver-found-teens-familys-long-wait-over/KCQDXSZHL5CW7I5JXVZ2HJZY7Y/ Raphael Franks, Avneesh VincentThe teen went missing on Labour Day, when he was reportedly swept out to sea. Tue, 31 Oct 2023 03:36:40 +0000 A police spokeswoman confirmed a body had been found in the Tanutanu Stream, near Ahipara in the Far North, but said it hadn’t been formally identified yet. The teenager went missing near the Herekino Harbour (pictured). Photo / Peter de Graaf

Mega game of pick-up sticks as work begins to clear cyclone-sunk Hawke’s Bay bridge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/mega-game-of-pick-up-sticks-as-work-begins-to-clear-cyclone-sunk-hawkes-bay-桥/7UXPWRHZYZEJ5HTAJTSLMVEJUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/mega-game-of-pick-up-sticks-as-work-begins-to-clear-cyclone-sunk-hawkes-bay-桥/7UXPWRHZYZEJ5HTAJTSLMVEJUU/ Diggers looked as if they were playing pick-up sticks on Tuesday.Tue, 31 Oct 2023 02:12:41 +0000 A game of pick up sticks with diggers took place on Tuesday as crews started to clear debris near the decimated Waikare Gorge bridge on State Highway 2. Photo / Paul Taylor
